title: GPH Ghana unveils fuel enhancement product
text:
27 August 2015 20:36 CET GPH Ghana unveils fuel enhancement product By MyJoyOnline 
GPH Ghana, the local product distributor of Globo Hydro Power Limited of Australia has unveiled a fuel enhancement product in Accra. 
The product called Globo Hydro Power™ system best described as Global Hydrogen Power on the Ghanaian market. 
Globo Hydro Power Limited a fuel enhancement process, which utilises Hydrogen Gas to dramatically reduce fuel consumption and negative greenhouse gas emissions across Petrol, Diesel, LPG and Bio-Fuel engines. 
Globo Hydro Power™ helps fuels to burn more efficiently during the combustion process of an internal combustion engine and reduces up to 50 percent savings in fuel consumption in automotive applications. 
Speaking at the launch, the Chief Executive Officer of GHP Ghana, Martino Kashif believes Globo Hydro Power™ has come at an “opportune time for Ghana as the country struggles through an energy crisis.” 
He noted that, Globo Hydro Power™ would help its users offset cost and make huge savings in their day-to-day energy consumption whilst reducing the strain on the environment by cutting down on greenhouse gasses. 
Mr. Kashif said Globo Hydro Power™ comes in an installation kitwith a Hydrogen Storage Cylinder securely installed into the boot in the case of a vehicle and the Hydrogen hosing then feeds hydrogen gas from the storage cylinder into the engine bay of an internal combustion engine. 
This he added sets off a number of processes that enhances the fuel efficiency of the engine. 
GHP Ghana CEO is convinced the only way to control the negative greenhouse gas emission in to the atmosphere is by using Globo Hydro Power system. 
Mr. Kashif urged users of petrol, diesel, LPG and bio fuel to try the energy-efficient system. 
Story by Ghana/Joy Business
